sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_ci_analytics_formula_override</collection> <condition>current.advanced == true</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Value Script</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var sourceGr = new GlideRecord(current.source_table); sourceGr.query(); sourceGr.next(); var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator(); evaluator.putVariable('sourceGr', sourceGr); var res = evaluator.evaluateScript(current, 'value_script', null); if (res == null) { var err = evaluator.withReturnError(true).evaluateScript(current, 'value_script', null); if (err != null) { gs.addErrorMessage(err); current.setAbortAction(true); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-29 08:19:39</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>139402ad53eb10101dccddeeff7b1222</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Value Script</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_139402ad53eb10101dccddeeff7b1222</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-07 05:26:05</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=139402ad53eb10101dccddeeff7b1222"/> </record_update>
